name: Asani Hot Air Brush - Multipurpose Blow Dryer Brush with Interchangeable Heads, Heated Round Brush for Curling or Straightening, Volumizer and Styling Tool for All Hair Types
short_description: STYLE YOUR HAIR AT HOME: Bring out the stylist in you with this incredible hot air brush. It is designed to meet all your hair styling demands in the comfort of your own home. Save time and money by effectively doing your hair on your own. It is the perfect deal for doing all kinds of hair quickly and safely.

MULTI-PURPOSE HOT AIR BRUSH: Unlike other dryers that overheat or take forever to dry your hair, our multi-purpose brush offers quick, comfortable styling. With interchangeable heads for drying, straightening, curling, and more, you can effortlessly create unique looks. Just press a button to switch between the 1", 1.25", and 2" x 1.25" oval barrels. CUSTOMERS PLEASE NOTE: This has a NON-ROTATING barrel brush.

USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN: This handy hair dryer is designed for efficient performance. It has a unique oval design that helps smooth out hair and prevent tangling. Its round edges create volume while its 360-degree swivel cord and tufted nylon bristles make it easy and comfortable to use. It has a comfortable ergonomic handle that’s easy to hold. The unit measures 14.5" long overall (not including the cable) and 2.25" wide at the handle.

ULTIMATE SAFETY FEATURES: Operating at 110V-127 Volts, the Asani dryer prioritizes safety. The ALCI safety plug detects electrical imbalances, preventing electrocution. The anti-scalding head protects your scalp, and advanced noise reduction. WARNING: This product will not work on 220-240v outlets. Doing so may damage the product.

MINIMAL HAIR DAMAGE: Unlike traditional dryers, the Asani hot air brush with ceramic-coated heads offers even heat distribution. Incorporating 360-degree negative ions technology, it conditions and nourishes hair, leaving it soft, smooth, and shiny. DISCLAIMER: Your results will vary depending on the user’s hair type, condition, and skill level. This product may not work well on short hair. Please refer to our short video tutorial in the product image gallery for proper usage.

CUSTOMIZABLE HEAT SETTINGS - With 2 heat speeds and a cool option, you can adjust the temperature based on your hair type or desired style. Whether you want sleek straight hair or voluminous curls, this brush has got you covered.

SAVE TIME & ENERGY - Cut down on your styling time by using our brush that combines both drying and styling in one easy step. No more switching between tools or waiting for your hair to dry before styling.

PROFESSIONAL RESULTS AT HOME - Get salon-quality results without leaving your house. Our Hairitage Up in The Air Volumizing Brush is perfect for all hair types and lengths, making it a must-have tool for every woman's beauty routine.
product_description: Achieve the perfect salon-worthy blowout at home with Hairitage Up in The Air Volumizing Brush + Hair Dryer. This innovative styling tool combines a brush and hair dryer in one, saving you time and effort while delivering gorgeous results. Featuring ceramic tourmaline technology, this brush evenly distributes heat to reduce damage and promote shiny, smooth hair. With 2 heat speeds plus a cool option for setting your style, the Hot Air Volumizer Brush is customizable to suit any hair type or desired look. Say goodbye to flat or frizzy locks - get bouncy blownout hair effortlessly with Hairitage!

This hair brush can help you create salon-style blowouts at home. Reveal your style with Revlon Hair Tools. Styling Tip: Use on dry to damp hair for best results and achieve smooth, straight hair at home. name: Revlon Revlon One-step Hair Dryer and Volumizer Hot Air Brush, Pink, 1 count
short_description: Style, Dry & Volumize Your Hair in One Step! Max Drying Power with 30% Less Frizz and helps reduce hair damage
Unique Non-Detachable Oval Brush Design for Smoothing the Hair, while the round edges create volume. Designed with Nylon Pin & Tufted Bristles for detangling, improved volume, and control
3 Heat/Speed Settings with Cool option for styling flexibility

Safety First: The Revlon One Step Hair Dryer and Volumizer meets U.S. safety requirements and features the ETL Certification, unit is designed for 120 Volt USA outlets only. DO NOT use a voltage converter or adapter as it will damage the unit
1100 Watts of Power - Note that wattage of this appliance may vary depending on the location of use
Volumizer Care: Clean air inlet regularly, remove hair from the brush after every use and do not wrap cord around the unit. To keep bristles in best condition let unit cool before storing
product_description: The Revlon One-Step Hair Dryer and Volumizer is a designed Hot Air Brush to deliver gorgeous volume and brilliant shine in a single step. The unique non detachable oval brush design smooths hair while the rounded edges quickly create volume at the root for beautifully full-bodied bends at the ends in a single pass. The brush is designed with Nylon Pin and Tufted Bristles for detangling, improve volume and control. Styling flexibility is guaranteed with 3 Heat/Speed Settings and a Cool Option. Built to provide just the right amount of heat. Unlike conventional hair dryers, this volumizer can be placed closer to the scalp for lift. Boosted by Ionic Technology through a built-in genuine ION generator, hair dries fast and helps reduce heat damage. The One Step Unit is designed for 120V USA outlets only, we do not recommend use of a voltage adapter or converter, as it will damage the unit. Safety first! The Revlon One-Step Hair Dryer and Volumizer meets U.S. safety requirements and proudly features the ETL Certification seal. Directions: For faster results towel dry hair to remove excess water. Separate hair into manageable sections. Item Weight: 1.8-pound Note: If you need 220V or for other counties – please check Amazon in that country for the correct voltage and plug.

short_description: Salon-Quality Blowouts at Home - With REVLON One-Step Volumizer PLUS Hair Dryer and Styler, get salon-like blowouts in up to half the time and treat your hair to up to 50% less heat exposure and 75% more shine. Embrace volume and waves - in just one step

Elevated Thermal Brush - Achieve precise root styling and volume with a 30% smaller barrel and slim handle With ceramic-titanium tourmaline technology for heat protection, a 40% improved motor, and a detachable head, it’s perfect at home or on the go

Simplified But Versatile - Let the Revlon Volumizer Plus unlock flexible styling possibilities with the added heat settings for low, medium, high, and cool shots tailored to your hair needs to achieve less damage. Damp to dazzling has never been easier

Your Shortcut To Fabulous Hair -The 2.4” round brush protects your hair with ceramic titanium tourmaline tech and detangles easily with charcoal-infused pins. It smooths, lifts, and curls like a pro Great for all hair types and best with mid-long hair

All Your Styling Needs in One-Step - Dry and style like a pro in one easy step Revlon’s One-Step Hair Styling Collection transforms damp, dull hair into sleek perfection. Say goodbye to hassle and hello to confidence with effortless, stunning results
product_description: You thought your mind couldn’t be blown anymore? Introducing the Revlon One-Step Volumizer 2.0 PLUS. The PLUS is designed to give you one-step salon quality results…and then some! Dull strands won’t get a second thought from you again when you discover 75% shinier blowouts in up to half the time*. PLUS, the revolutionary oval brush head touts a bold NEW size that’s versatile enough for all hair types, gets closer to the root, and unlocks even more style. The smaller 2.4” size creates even more volume from top to bottom, and lets you blowout beyond – go classic, or add flips, soft waves and more. Ceramic Titanium Tourmaline technology works to do the most for your hair – less damage with 50% less heat exposure. PLUS, a smooth glide for easy styling (no pulling pain), consistent drying and styling, reduced frizz and silky shine, and help sealing in moisture for oh so healthy-looking strands. And, a longer-lasting motor for 40% longer life…let’s keep those blowouts coming! But that’s not all. Ready for more PLUS? OTHER FEATURES: Four heat/speed settings (low/med/high/cool) let you tailor your blowout to your hair type and styling needs. The PLUS is also travel & storage friendly with a fresh detachable design! Simply flip the easy-to-use release button, detach the brush head from the handle and go. Take control of your blowouts with the brand-new slimmer & sleeker handle and experience greater styling control. PLUS, new charcoal-infused nylon pins provide ultimate drying and styling. Easily detangle & refresh and tufted boar bristles gently grip, smooth, and add shine. PLUS, that color combo is just easy-on-the eyes. Get ready to play with the plus! The Revlon Volumizers make life easier and styling bolder! The One Step Unit is designed for 120V USA outlets only, we do not recommend use of a voltage adapter or converter, as it will damage the unit. Note wattage will vary depending on the location of use.
